AltName.entry: MARY ROSE INFORMATION GROUP AND WARRIOR PRESERVATION SOCIETY

Desc.entry: Aileen and George Wade's subjects are: History, Recovery and Conservation of the Mary Rose; HMS Warrior (1860) - the only surviving Victorian ironclad; Naval reviews at Spithead from 1773-1977. Illustrated slide talks. Donations please to Mary Rose Trust, Warrior Preservation Society or selected charities for Naval Reviews at Spithead.
